manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Alkaline C Cell Batteries Everyday Alkaline Batteries Amazon Basics C Cell batteries offer reliable power for a variety of everyday devices, including radios, toys, clocks, flashlights, and more. Safe Design Made with anti-corrosion components, the battery's air- and liquid-tight seal holds the power in until it’s needed. 5-Year Shelf Life The leak-free batteries offer a 5-year shelf life- use them right away or stock up to have reserves on hand. Multiple bulk pack sizes available. Emergency Ready The batteries come in handy for weather radios, flashlights, and other emergency must-haves in case of extreme weather or power outages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Basics C Cell Batteries: Affordable Powerhouse for Long-Lasting Performance
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out the Amazon Basics 12-Pack C Cell Alkaline All-Purpose Batteries, and I must say, they've become my go-to choice for powering various devices. The performance, combined with the cost-effectiveness, makes them stand out in the crowded battery market. First and foremost, the 1.5-volt output is consistent and reliable. I used these batteries in a range of devices, from flashlights to electronic toys, and they delivered a steady stream of power. This reliability is crucial, especially when dealing with gadgets that demand a stable energy source. What sets these batteries apart is their impressive 5-year shelf life. It's a game-changer for those who like to stock up on batteries for emergencies or bulk purchases. Knowing that I have a reliable power source even after years of storage gives me peace of mind. The packaging is simple and practical, making it easy to store the batteries without worrying about damage. The clear expiration date on each battery is a thoughtful addition, helping users keep track of their freshness. Considering the affordability of the Amazon Basics C Cell Batteries, they offer exceptional value for money. The cost per battery is budget-friendly, making it a practical choice for everyday use. I found these batteries to perform as well as, if not better than, some higher-priced alternatives. In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 12-Pack C Cell Alkaline All-Purpose Batteries have earned their place as a reliable and cost-effective power solution. Whether you need them for household gadgets, emergency supplies, or kids' toys, these batteries deliver long-lasting performance without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Trusted Choice!
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 12-Pack C Cell Alkaline Batteries have become a staple in my household, providing reliable power for a variety of devices. As a busy individual with numerous electronic gadgets, having a steady supply of dependable batteries is essential, and these batteries have not disappointed.With a 1.5-volt output, these C cell batteries offer consistent performance, ensuring my devices operate at their optimal levels. From remote controls to portable fans and flashlights, these batteries have powered them all with ease.One of the standout features of these batteries is their impressive 5-year shelf life. This means I can stock up on them without worrying about them losing their potency over time. Having a long shelf life is especially beneficial for those who don't go through batteries quickly, providing peace of mind that they'll be ready to use whenever needed.The Amazon Basics C Cell Alkaline Batteries have also proved their worth in high-drain devices. Even power-hungry gadgets like gaming controllers and digital cameras benefit from their reliable performance, giving me extended use without frequent replacements.Another reason I trust these batteries is their compatibility with various brands and devices. They fit snugly into battery compartments, ensuring a secure connection for uninterrupted power supply. This versatility makes them an ideal choice for anyone with a diverse array of electronic devices.Furthermore, the value offered by the 12-pack is excellent. I find myself saving money compared to buying individual batteries or smaller packs. Plus, with this larger quantity on hand, I'm always prepared for any battery-related emergencies.I appreciate the durability of these batteries as well. They hold up well in extreme temperatures, and I've never experienced leaks or other issues that can damage devices. This reliability is crucial for protecting my electronic gadgets from potential damage caused by subpar batteries.In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 12-Pack C Cell Alkaline Batteries have exceeded my expectations in terms of performance and value. Their long shelf life, compatibility, and consistent power output make them a top choice for powering various devices around my home. If you're seeking affordable and reliable batteries for everyday use, these Amazon Basics batteries are a trustworthy option that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting and cost efficient 👍
reviews.reviewText: The AmazonBasics 12 Pack C Batteries have been a reliable and cost-effective solution for my battery needs. Here's why:1. Long-Lasting Power: These C batteries have provided a surprisingly long-lasting power supply for my various devices. From portable radios to kids' toys, they consistently deliver the juice required to keep things running smoothly.2. Value for Money: One of the standout features of these batteries is their affordability. The 12-pack provides excellent value, especially when compared to purchasing individual batteries. This makes them a practical choice for households with multiple devices that require C batteries.3. Consistent Performance: I've experienced consistent performance with these AmazonBasics batteries. They maintain a steady voltage output, preventing any unexpected device shutdowns due to power fluctuations.4. Durability: These C batteries have proven to be durable, and they have not leaked or corroded in my devices, even after extended use. This is crucial for maintaining the integrity of gadgets and toys.In summary, the AmazonBasics 12 Pack C Batteries are a dependable and budget-friendly choice. They've consistently met my power needs and are a cost-effective solution for various household devices. If you're in search of reliable C batteries that won't break the bank, these are definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I have used these batteries for a long time. They do not last quite as long as the name brands like Duracell and Energizer, but they are considerably less expensive and do hold up well. I would say they probably last about 90% as long as the name brands.
